SigninMessage:
Welcome to WiMi5.
Please insert your credentials to sign in.
SignUpTermsAcceptText: I have read and agree to the WiMi5
SignUpTermsNotifyText: I'd like to receive updates by email. See our
SignUpThankYou: Check your email and follow the instructions to complete the registration process. Please, check your email account's spam or junk folder to ensure the message was not filtered.
ActivateResultOK: Your account was successfully activated. Now, you will be redirected to the sign in form. Please, insert your credentials there.
ActivateResultKO: Something wrong happened on the activation process. You will be redirected to the sign up form. Please, re-sign up again. Sorry for the inconvenience.
RecoverPasswordMessage: Please, enter your email to begin the reset password process:
RecoverPasswordPostMessage: Check your email and follow the instructions to reset your account's password. Watch out because this email could be stored as spam.
ResetPasswordPostMessage: Your password has been changed, we will do an automatic signin using credentials.
VerifyEmailMessage: Thank you for verifying your email address '%1'. Now you have full access to your free account.
